titleStmt.title: A translation of the articles established by the most excellent magistracy of revisors and regulators of the publick revenue in the exchequer at Venice and approved by the Senate the 5th of March, 1693 in matter of erecting a profitable adventure for the fortunate of one hundred and fifty thousand tickets or bolletines of two ducats each : March the 9th, 1693.
titleStmt.author: Neale, Thomas, d. 1699?

titleStmt.title: A translation of the articles established by the most excellent magistracy of revisors and regulators of the publick revenue in the exchequer at Venice and approved by the Senate the 5th of March, 1693 in matter of erecting a profitable adventure for the fortunate of one hundred and fifty thousand tickets or bolletines of two ducats each : March the 9th, 1693.
titleStmt.author: Neale, Thomas, d. 1699?

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Neale by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in Chetham's Library.
